image - package image
 
Image - Class in image
Class representing an image.
Image(byte[][]) - Constructor for class image.Image
Creates a new image that is 8-bits depth (from 0 to 255) with the values of the matrix img
Image(int[][]) - Constructor for class image.Image
Assumes the image is grey and the image values are at most 32 bits depth and creates a new image based on the values of matrix img.
Image(int, int) - Constructor for class image.Image
Instantiates a new 8-bits depth grey image
Image(int, int, int) - Constructor for class image.Image
Creates a 8-bits depth image
Image(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class image.Image
 
Image(int, int, int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class image.Image
 
Image(short[][]) - Constructor for class image.Image
Creates a new image that is 16-bits depth with the values of the matrix img
Image(Image) - Constructor for class image.Image
Clones a image of type Image, creates a new object that is identical to the previous image but is a different object
Image(BufferedImage) - Constructor for class image.Image
If the image is RGB-layered it will be converted to one single layer as the mean of every layer.
Image(File) - Constructor for class image.Image
 
Image(String) - Constructor for class image.Image

Intersection - Class in similarity
Implements an intersection between images, counts how many intensities they have in common.
Intersection() - Constructor for class similarity.Intersection
Counts the number of intensities that both image1 and image2 have, i.e., how many intensity values they have in common.
Intersection(Image, Image) - Constructor for class similarity.Intersection
Counts the number of intensities that both image1 and image2 have, i.e., how many intensity values they have in common.

invert() - Method in class similarity.SimilarityMeasure
Returns false if it is a measure like Mean Differences, Hausdorff Distance, etc, where the lower the number returned the better and returns true otherwise

isEqual(Image, Image, int) - Method in class similarity.SimilarityMeasure
Checks if the images are equal or not according to a set threshold regarding all bands (all bands are compared).
isEqual(Image, Image, int, int) - Method in class similarity.SimilarityMeasure
Checks if the images are equal or not according to a set threshold regarding the band passed as parameter (just one band is compared).
